trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_SEQ_00<tab>Ysayle wishes to survey the approach to the distant towers.

TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_SEQ_01<tab>Ysayle tells you of the three towers known as Anyx Trine, and of the dragons that dwell within. Without their cooperation, she claims, the way to Sohm Al's summit will remain closed. Meet your companions on the approach to Anyx Trine, and speak with Ysayle once more.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_SEQ_02<tab>Ysayle notes with dismay that Gnath forces have occupied the road to Anyx Trine. Cut a path through their ranks, and gain entrance to the towers.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_SEQ_03<tab>You have defeated a group of Gnath soldiers. Continue towards Anyx Trine, defeating any resistance you encounter.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_SEQ_04<tab>Once more, you are forced to weather a storm of Gnath hostility. Resume your march along the path, and speak with Ysayle at the entrance to Anyx Trine.

TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_SEQ_05<tab>Upon entering the courtyard of Anyx Trine, Ysayle hails the dragon Vidofnir─the friend of whom she spoke earlier. Though apparently willing to open the way to Sohm Al's summit, the Dravanian declares that she cannot leave her post unguarded for fear of the Gnath's god. Suddenly, the beastmen's aggression begins to make sense─they act under the influence of a primal. Pausing only to seek your approval, Alphinaud offers to slay the creature, that Vidofnir might assist you in turn.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ysayle.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_TODO_01<tab>Defeat enemies on the path to Anyx Trine.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_TODO_02<tab>Defeat enemies on the path to Anyx Trine.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Ysayle.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_000<tab>Spy you the three great towers to the west? Ishgardians know them as Anyx Trine. The place serves as a roost for Hraesvelgr's lesser kindred.

TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_001<tab>If we are to reach the peak of Sohm Al, then we must first beseech these dragons to open the way. But do not be disheartened─the one who leads them is a friend.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_002<tab>Of rather more concern is the disposition of the Gnath. Let us survey the approach to the towers, and see if the path is clear.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ALPHINAUD_000_014<tab>Dragons in the sky, and Gnath upon the ground... One must needs sprout eyes in the back of one's head to survive this land!
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ESTINIEN_000_015<tab>These antmen are bold to bring their war to the dragons' doorstep. Mayhap we should invite them to man the walls of Ishgard...
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_010<tab>'Tis as I feared: the road ahead is teeming with Gnath soldiers.

TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab>Marcechamp did not exaggerate, then. These beastmen have grown brazen indeed if they would threaten the dragons so openly. Do they intend to assault the lair itself...?
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_012<tab>I pray they do not... Mighty though my Dravanian friends are, they are yet vulnerable to the Gnath's muskets.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_013<tab>There is no route save the one before us. Should the beastmen offer battle, we have no choice but to accept.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ALPHINAUD_000_016<tab>The Gnath are fast becoming a nuisance. They seem to plague our every step.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ESTINIEN_000_017<tab>Hmph. 'Twould seem the enemy of mine enemy is <var 1A 02 /var>also<var 1A 01 /var> mine enemy.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_BALLOON_100_018<tab>All will belong to us!
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_020<tab>I take no pleasure in killing the Gnath. 'Twas to <var 1A 02 /var>avoid<var 1A 01 /var> bloodshed that I agreed to join you on this journey.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_021<tab>...Well, it cannot be helped. We may proceed into the courtyard together─but leave the task of hailing its occupants to me.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_100_021<tab>And <var 1A 02 /var>keep your lance on your back<var 1A 01 /var>, dragoon.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ESTINIEN_000_022<tab>On my word to the Warrior of Light, I shall start no fight...only <var 1A 02 /var>finish<var 1A 01 /var> it.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ICEHEART_000_023<tab>You truly are beyond salvation. Come, then...
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>The scale of this structure is nothing short of astounding... But that is only to be expected, I suppose, given the size of its occupants.
TEXT_HEAVNA310_01611_ESTINIEN_000_031<tab>A greater dragon approaches...
